Autoloader
Class
Autoloader

This class handles all class autoloading

new Autoloader($initial_path,$class_ext);
Functions
__construct
public function __construct (
$initial_path,
$class_ext = []
)

Class constructor

Parameters
$initial_path

Is a string URL of the base directory to search for object files.

$class_ext

Is an unindexed string array of possible file extensions of class object files.
